thread.title: Polling opens in crucial Greece bailout referendum
thread.title_full: Polling opens in crucial Greece bailout referendum

title: Polling opens in crucial Greece bailout referendum
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Sun, Jul 5, 2015, 05:23 BST - UK Markets closed Polling opens in crucial Greece bailout referendum AFP – 12 minutes ago View Photo 

Polls opened Sunday for Greece's crucial referendum on whether or not to accept international creditors' conditions for a bailout, with the EU on tenterhooks for an outcome which could shape the bloc's future. 
Almost 10 million Greeks eligible to vote have until 7:00pm local time (1600 GMT) to cast their ballots, with results on the plebiscite -- cast by many eurozone leaders as vote on whether to leave the single currency -- expected from 1800 GMT onwards.
